description: This file initializes the API package by importing key database components and models such as Base, database engine functions, and model classes like User, Game, Move, and MatchHistory.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user in the system.

classes.name: Move
classes.description: Represents a move made in a game.

classes.name: MatchHistory
classes.description: Tracks the history of matches played.

methods.name: get_session_factory
methods.description: Returns a session factory for database sessions.
